content: if you re looking for a crochet hat pattern that s versatile easy to crochet and has a neater looking band you re in the right place the basic bottom-up crochet hat here at b hooked is great for donating gifting and of course just because with this project you ll learn the fundamentals of crocheting a hat starting at the band and working up to the crown you ll learn how to crochet a long flat piece using a stitch pattern that looks more like classic ribbing and how to start working in rounds lastly you ll get to practice some basic decreases to make the crown **recommended supplies** 1 skein lion brand scarfie preemie 35 yds/ 27 m baby 55 yds/ 46 m toddler 70 yds/ 64 m child 80 yds/ 73 m tween 110 yds/ 96 m womens 110 yds/ 99 m mens 135 yds/ 110 m 6 5 mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors **finished size** preemie | 8 5″ circumference 4″ length baby | 13″ circumference 5 5″ length toddler | 15″ circumference 6 5″ length child | 17″ circumference 7″ length tween | 18 5″ circumference 7 75″ length womens | 20″ circumference 8″ length mens | 22″ circumference 8 5″ length
